name: Explosao Gerador
potentialImpact:
Localized power disruptions possible
Compromise of key grid control systems
Potential data exfiltration of sensitive operational information
recommendedActions:
Escalate to security response team
Monitor affected systems closely
Prepare for potential isolation of systems
Activate DDoS mitigation services
Increase bandwidth or implement rate limiting
Contact upstream providers for assistance

name: Pedro
potentialImpact:
Degraded system performance and reliability
Limited access to operational systems
Increased vulnerability to secondary attacks
recommendedActions:
Investigate the threat further
Increase monitoring of affected systems
Prepare mitigation strategies
Activate DDoS mitigation services
Increase bandwidth or implement rate limiting
Contact upstream providers for assistance
